name: $tar $hip $hooter
description:
This is my 2D shooter project 

Modifications:

New player model & animation

3 new & originally designed levels distinct from one another with progressive structure within each level introducing different environments, types of enemies, overall difficulty increase, different soundtrack for each level, and differences in look/feel of level

Complete overhaul of in game UI changing all font and redesigning the menu and select screens to have more appealing colors that are vibrant to the eye. including this all menus continue with the same theme creating cohesion across the different levels and menus of the game. font also edited to fit feel into boxes so that it is easier to read.

Credits: New ship model: Pixel Art Space Ship Part 1 created by Crehera on unity assets store & Font : Fatality FPS Gaming Font created by Frontier on Unity assets store

Side note:

Although I'm proud of what I did for this project these design modifications made me realize just  how limited I am with my ability to create a game and has shown me things that could be useful to my arsenal.

Created by: Charles Morris
